com.quickveggies.dao

Class DatabaseClient.MSSQLServerDBProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.quickveggies.dao.DatabaseClient.DBProfile
      • com.quickveggies.dao.DatabaseClient.MSSQLServerDBProfile
  • Enclosing class:
    DatabaseClient

    public static class DatabaseClient.MSSQLServerDBProfile
extends DatabaseClient.DBProfile
    This class is intended to build up a microsoft Sql Server Database profile

    • Constructor Detail

      • MSSQLServerDBProfile

        public MSSQLServerDBProfile(java.lang.String host,
                            java.lang.String port,
                            java.lang.String login,
                            java.lang.String password,
                            java.lang.String databaseName,
                            java.lang.String instanceName)
        The constructor of the database profile
        Parameters:
        host - the ip or the hostname of the machine that contain the microsoft SQL Server database
        port - the port number of the Database
        login - the login used to connect to the database
        password - the password used to connect to the database
        databaseName - the database name
        instanceName - the instance of mssql server that will be used
